com.shorturl.service

Interface ShortUrlService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShortUrlServiceImpl

    public interface ShortUrlService
    SeqCounterServiceImpl class is used for creating sequence value for short hash creation. It has utility method to load buffer counter value. It uses AtomicLong class to manage thread safety of increment to counter.
    Author:
    rohit

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UrlBean generateShortUrl(UrlBean urlBean)
      generateShortUrl contains business logic for incrementing the counter generating mapped value for given long url, and ensures that it gets stored in database.
      UrlBean getLongUrl(java.lang.String shortUrlHash)
      getLongUrl method retrieves the given long url by calling repo object.

    • Method Detail

      • generateShortUrl

        UrlBean generateShortUrl(UrlBean urlBean)
        generateShortUrl contains business logic for incrementing the counter generating mapped value for given long url, and ensures that it gets stored in database.
        Parameters:
        urlBean, - Stores users input sent from controller class.
        Returns:
        UrlBean object containing the mapped short url value with given long url.

      • getLongUrl

        UrlBean getLongUrl(java.lang.String shortUrlHash)
        getLongUrl method retrieves the given long url by calling repo object.
        Parameters:
        shortUrlHash, - short url has for given long url.
        Returns:
        UrlBean, value received from database.
